content: *this simple yet elegant afghan is as nice to crochet as it is to wrap up in lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # chs-warmupamericaafghan skill level easy level 2 homespun® article #790 3 colors 3 balls each 9 balls total crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm gauge each piece measures 7 inches x 9 inches 18 x 23 cm from the book this afghan will warm a heart as well as a lap designed to the specifications of warm up america these blocks work up quickly into a cozy coverlet make one for a friend and then stitch a few extra rectangles - or perhaps an entire afghan - for this charitable organization knit version available also 1 see warm up america blanket #70404ad 2 for a similar crochet pattern in chenille thick & quick super bulky weight yarn homespun® article #790 knit version warm up america afghan #khs-warmupamericaafghan 3 search for more warm up america 4 patterns on ravelry 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/warm-up-america-afghan-knit 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/warm-up-america-blanket-70404ad 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/warm-up-america-afghan-khs-warmupamericaafghan 4 http //www ravelry com/patterns/search#pattern=warm%20up%20america&view=captioned_thumbs&sort=name
